response.overview: Singer-songwriter Winslow Leach seeks revenge on the nefarious music producer Swan, who steals both Winslow's music and his favorite singer for the grand opening of his new rock palace, the Paradise.
response.tagline: He sold his soul for rock n’ roll!
response.title: Phantom of the Paradise
